sentences.en: As the gladiators rolled away from the starting gates, a gasp went up when the Scottish cyclist's left foot clicked out of the pedal.
sentences.cn: 矫健的自行车手们纷纷骑车冲出起跑门，突然苏格兰选手的左脚咔嗒一声踩空了踏板，观众不禁倒抽了一口冷气。

sentences.en: He pressed down the accelerator pedal of his car.
sentences.cn: 他踩下汽车的加速器踏板.

sentences.en: He pushed hard on the brake pedal to avoid a collision.
sentences.cn: 他使劲踩下煞车踏板以避免撞车.

sentences.en: He refused to soft-pedal an investigation into the scandal.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝降低对这起丑闻的调查力度。

sentences.en: I couldn't reach the pedals on her bike.
sentences.cn: 我骑她的车够不到脚蹬子。

sentences.en: I saw him pedal to school every morning.
sentences.cn: 我看到他每天早晨骑自行车上学.

sentences.en: I suddenly pressed the brake pedal and we were both thrown forward.
sentences.cn: 我突然用力踩紧刹车踏板,结果我俩的身体都向前冲去.

sentences.en: She put her foot down on the accelerator pedal.
She was pedalling furiously (= very fast ) .
She was too tired to pedal back.
sentences.cn: 她太累了，没力气骑自行车回去。

sentences.en: Some guitar players tend to overuse the wah - wah pedal.
sentences.cn: 一些吉他手往往会滥用“哇哇”踏板.

sentences.en: The amount of calories that you burn depends on how hard you pedal and how much you weigh.
sentences.cn: 您燃烧的热量有多少，端看您骑得有多卖力及您本身的体重有多重。

sentences.en: The brake ( pedal ) is between the clutch and the accelerator.
sentences.cn: 制动器 ( 踏板 ) 在离合器和加速器之间.

sentences.en: The brake pedal had just snapped off.
sentences.cn: 刹车踏板刚刚啪的一声绷断了。

sentences.en: The harder the brake pedal is pressed, the greater the car's deceleration.
sentences.cn: 刹车踩得越用力，车子减速越猛。

sentences.en: The pedal had sheared off at the pivot.
This scooter didn't have a foot pedal to accelerate like the military motorcycles back then.
sentences.cn: 这台速克达并不像当时的军用摩托车是用脚踏板来加速.

sentences.en: Turn a special key, press the brake pedal, and your car's brakes lock.
sentences.cn: 转动一把特制的钥匙，踩下刹车踏板，这样你的汽车刹车就锁住了。

sentences.en: Your foot falls off the pedal and you stall the car.
sentences.cn: 你的脚离开踏板，汽车便会熄火。

phrases.tran_cn: （汽车等的）油门踏板；[机]加速踏板
（美）油门；加速器；汽车加速踏板

phrases.phrase: with the pedal to the metal
phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式)猛踩油门全速行驶

trans.tran_en: of or relating to the foot or feet
one of the two parts of a bicycle that you push round with your feet to make the bicycle go forward
one of the two parts of a bicycle that you push round with your feet to make the bicycle go forward
to turn or push the pedals on a bicycle or other machine with your feet

trans.tran_cn: 踩自行车的踏板，骑自行车
